mapper.select: SELECT * FROM STUDENT ORDER BY NUM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDENT (NAME, NUM, KOR, ENG, MATH, TOTAL, AVG) VALUES (#{name}, STUDENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{kor}, #{eng}, #{math}, #{total},#{avg})
mapper.update: UPDATE STUDENT SET NAME=#{name},KOR=#{kor}, ENG=#{eng}, MATH=#{math}, TOTAL=#{total}, avg=#{avg} WHERE NUM=#{num}
